item.description: I started to blog in English. I adopt HUGO to create a blog. HUGO is a static site generators. I impressed the speed of compile. And I upload posts to github. Basic Usage Create a post hugo new posts/xxx.md Preview hugo server -D Build static pages hugo -D Deploy cd public/ git init git remote add origin git@github.com:xxx git checkout -b gh-pages git add --all git commit -m 'initial commit' git push origin gh-pages
